name: to-do-list
description: A responsive website that able the user to add tasks and mark complete on it, edit it and delete it.  ## Built with HTML, css and JS.  ## Strategy - Used query media to make different screen sizes. - Local storege used to save data when browser closed. - Maniplated DOM to make all functions. ## Link Website URL: https://almahamans.github.io/to-do-list/main.html
